text: He argued that it was the only place where he could be safe from Rose."See here, said. "Same as I've always said, women rule the roost and no man's safe from 'em. Ought to be a better way of doing things. Take trees." He rattled on very happily.
handwritten_text: He argued that it was the only place where he could be safe from Rose."See here, said. "Same as I've always said, women rule the roost and no man's safe from 'em. Ought to be a better way of doing things. Take trees." He rattled on very happily.
